artist: Artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Publisher: Fukuda Kumajirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: darkened scene; carriage on L, with standing figure in C, with small dog on ground to the R of figure; standing figures with umbrellas on the R; willow tree in ULQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Rainy Night at Yanagiwara
